price: 10. Nayebisaki bango été: Botubela epai ya Nkolo na bino. Ya soló, ye azali molimbisi.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
